data_table.description: Physical Activity Form, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: RPAC1
variable.description: [Work activity]. At work do you sit. Q1 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC2
variable.description: [Work activity]. At work do you stand. Q2 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC3
variable.description: [Work activity]. At work do you walk. Q3 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC4
variable.description: [Work activity]. At work do you lift heavy loads. Q4 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC5
variable.description: [Work activity]. After working are you physically tired. Q5 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC6
variable.description: [Work activity]. At work do you sweat. Q6 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC7
variable.description: [Work activity]. In comparison with others of your own age do you think your work is physically. Q7 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC8
variable.description: [Sports]. Do you exercise or play sports? Q8 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC9
variable.description: [Sports]. Which sport or exercise do you do most frequently? Q9 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC9A
variable.description: [Sports]. Which sport or exercise do you do most frequently? Specify activity. [CROSSWALKING, EXERCISE WHEEL, HIT BALLS DRIVING RANGE, JUST EXERCISE, REFEREE, UNABLE TO SUPPLY, UNSPECIFIED, WALLY-BALL] Q9a [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC10
variable.description: [Sports]. How many hours a week do you do this activity? Q10 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC11
variable.description: [Sports]. How many months a year do you do this activity? Q11 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC12
variable.description: [Sports]. Do you do other exercises or play other sports? Q12 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC13
variable.description: [Sports]. What is your second most frequent sport or exercise? Q13 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC13A
variable.description: [Sports]. What is your second most frequent sport or exercise? Specify activity. [ARM EXERCISE, ARM EXERCISES, ARTHRITIS MOBILITY EXERC, BODY BY JAKE MULTI PURPO, CALANADICS REP.MOVEMENTS, DRIVING RANGE, FOUR SQUARE, GENERAL EXERCISE, HAND WEIGHTS FOR ARMS, ISOMETRICS, LEG EXERCISES SCIATICA, MOTORBIKE HILL CLIMBING, SENIOR AEROBIC, UNABLE TO SUPPLY, UNSPECICIED, UNSPECIFIED]. Q13a [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC14
variable.description: [Sports]. How many hours a week do you do this activity? Q14 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC15
variable.description: [Sports]. How many months a year do you do this activity? Q15 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC16
variable.description: [Sports]. Do you do other exercises or play other sports? Q16 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC17
variable.description: [Sports]. What is your third most frequent sport or exercise? Q17 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC17A
variable.description: [Sports]. What is your second most frequent sport or exercise? Specify activity.[5 # WEIGHT LIFT, HAND WEIGHTS, LIGHT WEIGHTS, REFEREE SOCCER, VARIETY OF BALL GAMES]. Q17a [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC18
variable.description: [Sports]. How many hours a week do you do this activity? Q18 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC19
variable.description: [Sports]. How many months a year do you do this activity? Q19 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC20
variable.description: [Sports]. Do you do other exercises or play other sports? Q20 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC21
variable.description: [Sports]. What is your fourth most frequent sport or exercise? Q21 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC21A
variable.description: [Sports]. What is your fourth most frequent sport or exercise? Specify activity. [EXERCISES FOR THERAPY]. Q21a [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC22
variable.description: [Sports]. How many hours a week do you do this activity? Q22 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC23
variable.description: [Sports]. How many months a year do you do this activity? Q23 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC24
variable.description: [Sports]. Do you do other exercises or play other sports? Q24 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC25
variable.description: [Leisure time]. During leisure time would you say you play sports or exercise. Q25 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC26
variable.description: [Leisure time]. In comparison with others of your own age do you think your physical activity during leisure time is. Q26 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC27
variable.description: [Leisure time]. During leisure time do you sweat. Q27 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC28
variable.description: [Leisure time]. During leisure time do you watch television. Q28 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC29
variable.description: [Leisure time]. During leisure time do you walk. Q29 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC30
variable.description: [Leisure time]. During leisure time do you bicycle. Q30 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC31
variable.description: [Other activities]. How many minutes do you walk and/or bicycle per day to and from work or shopping? Q31 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC33
variable.description: [Other activities]. Have you done any heavy physical work in the last 12 hours? Q33 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC34
variable.description: [Other activities]. Did you do any vigorous exercise or play any vigorous sports in the last 12 hours? Q34 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC32
variable.description: [Other activities]. How many flights of stairs do you climb up each day? Q32 [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC33A
variable.description: [Other activities]. How long ago did you complete it? Hours Q33a [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC33B
variable.description: [Other activities]. How long ago did you complete it? Minutes Q33b [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC34A
variable.description: [Other activities]. How long ago did you complete it? Hours. Q34a [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPAC34B
variable.description: [Other activities]. How long ago did you complete it? Minutes. Q34b [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPACFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: RPACCY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Physical Activity Form, exam 3]
